alert.note: Alert for Chester; Delaware (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 12 at 4:27PM EDT until August 12 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL CHESTER AND WEST CENTRAL DELAWARE COUNTIES... At 427 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Coatesville, or 8 miles west of West Chester, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... West Chester, Coatesville, Westtown, Downingtown, Gradyville, Cheyney, Marshallton, Concordville, Lionville-Marchwood, West Goshen, South Coatesville, Modena, Exton and Thorndale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
